author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Add the option of restricting the global tag written to an HDF5 file to the IOVs that correspond to a single run.

This reduces the size of an online data global tag from about 9 GB to 350 MB.

#### PR validation:

Tested running the HLT on the trimmed global tag.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of #48129 to 15.0.x for the NGT online tests.
title: conddb2hdf5: add option to restrict IOVs to a single run [15.0.x]
